snippet.title: Doki Doki Literature Club Plus - Official Exclusive Announcement Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2021
snippet.description:
The visual novel that unnerved players in 2017 returns with Doki Doki Literature Club Plus. In the exclusive reveal trailer, new side stories, improved HD visuals, new music tracks, and over 100 unlockable images were confirmed for the new, expanded version of the game arriving to PC and consoles on June 30.

#IGN #Gaming #SummerOfGaming
